nodes.documentation:
Core contract: The portal of NUTS platform.
All external operations are done through the NUTS platform.

createInstrument(address,uint256).details: Invoked by FSP to register a new instrument.

params.expiration: The lifetime of the issuance in days. 0 means never expires.
params.instrument_address: The address of the instrument contract

createIssuance(address,string).details: Invoked by seller to create new issuance

params.instrument_address: The address of the instrument of which the issuance is created

deactivateInstrument(address).details: Invoked by FSP to unregister an instrument

params.instrument_address: The address of the instrument contract

userdoc.notice: Core contract: The portal of NUTS platform. All external operations are done through the NUTS platform.
